info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:55AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, southeastern Bergen, southern Westchester, Queens, Bronx, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1054 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mott Haven, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Yonkers, Flushing, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Secaucus, Ridgefield, Throgs Neck Bridge, Midtown Manhattan, RFK Bridge, Laguardia Airport and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
